skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end technology involves the use of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create the visual and interactive aspects of websites and web applications. HTML structures the content, CSS styles it, and JavaScript adds dynamic functionality. Frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js enhance development efficiency and maintainability. These technologies work together to provide users.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Backend technology involves server-side development, managing databases, and ensuring the functionality core logic. Common languages include Java, Python, Ruby, and Node.js. Frameworks like Express, Django, and Spring streamline backend development. The backend handles data storage, retrieval, and business logic, enabling the front end to deliver of their  user experience.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI design focuses on the look and feel of a product, and interactive elements to ensure an aesthetically of their  pleasing and user-friendly interface. UX design emphasizes the overall experience and satisfaction of user, focusing on usability, accessibility, and user's journey product. Both UI and UX work together to create efficient interactions for the user of  the success of any digital product.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Webflow development involves using the Webflow platform to design, build, and launch responsive websites visually, without writing code. It provides a drag-and-drop interface for creating custom layouts and styles, making web design accessible to non-developers. Webflow also includes CMS capabilities for managing content and hosting services for deploying sites streamlines  directly.

portfolio.title: Real Estate.
portfolio.description: Discover your dream home with our curated listings, offering a range of properties to suit every lifestyle. Invest in your future with expert guidance and unparalleled market insights.

portfolio.title: App Dashboard
portfolio.description: Stay in control with our intuitive app dashboard, offering real-time insights and easy navigation. Manage your tasks and track progress with just a few taps.

portfolio.title: Easy Rental Home
portfolio.description: Find your perfect rental home effortlessly with our user-friendly platform. Experience seamless searches, secure transactions, and personalized support every step of the way.
